func.title: GetActMapVal

param.name: entry
param.desc: Name of the entry to be retrieved.

param.name: action
param.desc: Name of the activity of which to get an entry.

param.name: definition
param.desc: Object definition of which to get action data. If not specified, the definition of the calling object is used.

param.name: entry_number
param.desc: Index of the value to be retrieved if an entry contains multiple values.

func.desc: Gets activity data from the ActMap of an object.

example.code: var act_length = GetActMapVal("Length", GetAction()) * GetActMapVal("Delay", GetAction());
example.text: Calculates the time in ticks that the current action will take.
